summary: Implement and fix the trade file upload workflow so users can browse/select a file, upload it, and have the uploaded fileâ€™s data populate the system.
known_issues: Upload Trade File: 'Browse files' link does not work

existing_features.title: Fix the "Browse Files" control in the Trade Import > Upload File tab so it actually opens the native file picker and allows selecting a file (CSV/XLSX/XLS).

Implement the upload/import workflow for trade files: after a user selects a supported file, parse the file on the frontend, validate required columns (client_code, trade_date, exchange, segment, security, side, quantity, price, order_id, trade_id), and submit the parsed trades to the backend for persistence.

Update the Trade Import UI to reflect persisted imported data by wiring the "Import History" tab (or a new section within it) to fetch and display imported trades from the backend after an upload completes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix 'Browse files' link in Upload Trade File and ensure uploaded trade file data is parsed/imported to populate the system
Add backend trade storage and APIs so imported trade rows are saved in-canister and can be fetched back by the UI (so imported data is visible/populated inside the system after upload).

projectName: Fix Trade Import browse/upload and persist imported trade data in system
